00036 
00037 #ifndef CHECKMONOLR91VARS_HPP_
00038 #define CHECKMONOLR91VARS_HPP_
00039 
00040 #include "MonodomainProblem.hpp"
00041 
00042 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00043 void CheckMonoLr91Vars(MonodomainProblem<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& problem)
00044 {
00045 
00046     DistributedVector voltage = problem.rGetMesh().GetDistributedVectorFactory()->CreateDistributedVector(problem.GetSolution());
00047     for (DistributedVector::Iterator index = voltage.Begin();
00048          index != voltage.End();
00049          ++index)
00050     {
00051         // assuming LR model has Ena = 54.4 and Ek = -77
00052         double Ena   =  54.4;
00053         double Ek    = -77.0;
00054 
00055         TS_ASSERT_LESS_THAN_EQUALS( voltage[index] , Ena +  30);
00056         TS_ASSERT_LESS_THAN_EQUALS(-voltage[index] + (Ek-30), 0);
00057 
00058         std::vector<double> ode_vars = problem.GetMonodomainTissue()->GetCardiacCell(index.Global)->GetStdVecStateVariables();
00059         for (int j=0; j<8; j++)
00060         {
00061             // if not voltage or calcium ion conc, test whether between 0 and 1
00062             if ((j!=0) && (j!=7))
00063             {
00064                 TS_ASSERT_LESS_THAN_EQUALS(  ode_vars[j], 1.0);
00065                 TS_ASSERT_LESS_THAN_EQUALS( -ode_vars[j], 0.0);
00066             }
00067         }
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 #endif /*CHECKMONOLR91VARS_HPP_*/
